name: Document

properties.name: dirty
properties.description: The dirty state of the document

properties.name: displayName
properties.description: Display name of the document as shown in the UI. It doesn't necessarily refers to the file name without filename extension.

properties.name: path
properties.description: Returns a platform-specific path to the document on disk or empty if it doesn't currently have a path.

description: This is the base class for all document types. There are also specialized types for certain document types like e.g. WaveDocument
